kickstart.post:
mkdir -p /opt/rocks/thumper mkdir -p /opt/rocks/thumper/share useradd -u 419 -d /opt/rocks/thumper/zfsuser \ -m -s /bin/bash -g sys zfsuser
#!/bin/sh case "$1" in
"-c") mkdir -p /opt/rocks/thumper/zfsuser/.ssh; ssh-keygen -f /opt/rocks/thumper/zfsuser/.ssh/id_dsa \ -t dsa -q -N ''; chmod -R 0700 /opt/rocks/thumper/zfsuser/.ssh; chown -R zfsuser:sys /opt/rocks/thumper/zfsuser; ;; esac
sysidconfig -a /opt/rocks/thumper/share/zfs-key-setup.sh
mkdir -p /var/log/zfs-backup chown -R zfsuser:sys /var/log/zfs-backup chmod -R 0755 /var/log/zfs-backup
/bin/sed -e 's/^NFSD_SERVERS=[0-9]*/NFSD_SERVERS=512/' /etc/default/nfs > /tmp/nfs cp /tmp/nfs /etc/default/nfs
cp /etc/sfw/smb.conf-example /etc/sfw/smb.conf
*.err /var/adm/messages kern.debug /var/log/kern daemon.notice /var/adm/messages *.info /var/adm/messages
cp /opt/smartmontools/share/smartd.xml /var/svc/manifest/system/smartd.xml
